author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Ikea funny in store reviews: Jeff Wysaski trolls store | Life and Lifestyle | Lifestyle and Living | | dailytelegraph.com.au
text:
AS FAR as we’re concerned, anything that makes a trip to Ikea more bearable is a good thing indeed.
So we tip our hat to ‘internet comedian’ Jeff Wysaski for planting a collection of hilarious customer reviews around an Ikea store in the US, then posting photos of his trickery on his Imgur account for all to enjoy.
Bless you sir, for providing a side of giggles to go with the reasonably priced meatballs.
